Directions: In a greased 2-qt. baking dish, layer ham, onion, green pepper, raisins and pineapple. In a saucepan, combine the brown sugar, cornstarch, mustard and salt. Stir in pineapple juice and vinegar until smooth. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Remove from the heat; stir in soy sauce. Pour over pineapple. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through. Serve over rice.
Ingredients: 1 small green pepper, cut into rings
